text: @realDonaldTrump How can you say “respect his memory” when you are part of those who helped killing him ?!?! Last week you spent your time on a golf trip, talking about closing twitter and now you’re in a fucking bunker while your people are dying from covid19 (104000+ victims) and protesting...
